name: Cyklodev WP Paypal Integration
author: Zephilou

sections.description: Cyklodev WP Paypal integration allow you to define a shortcode and a widget with your paypal button inside. It was test with donate, buy and subscribe button.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload com.cyklodev.wordpress.paypal folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select your settings in ‘Cyklodev Paypal’ menu in WordPress
  4. Choose the name of shortcode you want to use
  5. Fill the html text that paypal gave to you
  6. Add optional text to the widget
sections.faq:
Is this a roxy plugin ?

It might be !
